https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3z4HfXZA34SpW3rL6c0JkyjtZSh.jpg Two men, two lives, a fateful encounter: Hagen suffers from irregular phases of sleep in which he cannot decide between dream and reality. When his frustrated wife cheats on him with the small-time criminal Niko a series of disturbing events is set in motion and the lives of both men will never be the same. Cortex
